links.title: Doug Field returns to Apple's 'Project Titan' after stint at Tesla
links.description: Doug Field, who previously worked as a vice president of Mac hardware engineering at Apple, has returned to the Cupertino tech giant after a nearly five-year stint at Tesla to work on the company's secretive automotive initiative.

links.title: What to expect now that we reached the highs
links.description: Free After-Hours Analysis: On Thursday the S&P 500 slipped for a second consecutive day, but "slipped" is a bit of an exaggeration since combined both days didn't even register a 0.2% loss. That leaves us still within 1% of all-time highs as we simply slow down following last week's impressive bounce off 2,800 support.
